input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Fette Filter - Elite 469918 Refrigerator Air Filter Compatible for Kenmore. (2-Pack)

Item specifications:
Easy to intsall. Replace every 6 months
15 times more effective than baking soda in reducing orders
Less costly than the OEM without compromising quality.
Compatible with Kenmore Elite 469918 Refrigerator Air Filter
High Quality Fette Filter Brand Product
Carbon-based, long-lasting charcoal filter
Replace every 6 months
Packaging may vary


Product description:
input_text.Response A: Storm, a Bowen Designs sculpture, is an incredibly detailed sculpture of the X-Men franchise's Storm in her white costume.  This statue measures 12" Tall and was sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen.  Storm is poised with arms spread, ready to harness the power of a raging storm.  The attention to detail on this sculpture is truly stunning.  From the flowing fabric of her costume to the individual strands of Storm's hair, this is a work of art that will be a treasured addition to any collection.  Purchase Storm today and harness the power of the storm!
input_text.Response B: These refrigerator air filters are compatible with Kenmore refrigerators, and have 15 times more effectiveness in reducing orders than baking soda!  They are easy to install, and less expensive than original manufacturer parts.  The charcoal-based filters help keep your refrigerator running smoothly, and should be replaced every 6 months.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
